item.title: For Alyson Stoner, Writing Their Memoir Was a “Beautiful Process of Emptying My Own Mind”
item.description: The actor and mint New York Times-bestselling author reflects on the success of their book and the changes the entertainment industry needs to make to ensure the safety of child performers.
